column1: Employment Table 1. Experienced Loss of Employment Income, by Select Characteristics: Seattle-Tacoma-Bellevue, WA Metro Area
Source: U.S. Census Bureau Household Pulse Survey, Week 42.
Note: These data are experimental. Users should take caution using estimates based on subpopulations of the data – sample sizes may be small and the standard errors may be large.**
